text:
Other 3rd party tools available to the consumer for determining the Win RE
partition size(total, used and free) Acronis and Macrium imaging programs(both
have the ability to show the size of the WinRe partition(total and used). -
Macrium Reflect has a free edition - Acronis is fee based program, but those
with a Western Digital disk may have been provided(with the disk or
downloadable) a freem less feature version) EaseUS Partition Master(free version
for home use) also has the ability to show the WinRE partition size(total, free,
used) and the ability to 'Explorer' the WinRe Recovery partition showing its
folder and subfolder structure and the current winre.wim file, size, and date
residing on the WinRE partition. Even so, more hoops to jump through than a
Windows end-user should be required to do to use and maintain their device(s).
...w

metadata.subject: RE: [patchmanagement] You may hit a 0x80070643 - ERROR_INSTALL_FAILURE
